name: TalkingInformationCenter
0:
”Alexa, open talking information center”
”Alexa, ask talking information center to listen live”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talking information center
des: Use this skill to listen live and on demand to the Talking Information Center. For more information on the Talking Information Center, visit ticnetwork.org
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
